meanings.definition: A person or thing that focuses.
meanings.sent1: The teacher was one of the best focusers in the school, always helping students concentrate.
meanings.sent2: The focusers in the camera helped capture clear images of the beautiful scenery.
meanings.sent3: The little girl's teddy bear was her trusty focuser during her bedtime stories.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for painting made her a true focuser, bringing life to every stroke of the brush.
meanings.sent5: The magnifying glass acted as a powerful focuser, revealing tiny details in the intricate design.
